title: Determines
task: Find 3 different determines in the paragraph.
definition: A determiner is a word that introduces a noun such as 'a', 'the', 'this', 'these', 'those', 'some', 'many', 'my', 'our', or 'their'

title: Singular Nouns
task: Find 3 different singular nouns in the paragraph

title: Plural Nouns
task: Find 3 different plural nouns in the paragraph
